Name: 4islands
About the game: Once on the island, you will need to solve the riddle - who you are and why you are on these islands. Exploring the area you will need to engage in crafting, construction, hunting and survival. A lot of interesting mechanics and a mysterious plot. Exploring 4 islands, each of which differs in its appearance and mechanics, try to unravel the plot, which will be presented only with the release of the game in release, to maintain mystery. You have to: COMBATING NATURAL CONDITIONS You will need to look for warmth or try to find a cool place, as temperature conditions will directly affect the well-being of the character. MEETING WITH REDUCED ANIMALS Not all animals living on the islands are friendly. Some can be deadly! BUILDING A HOUSE Create your own home, it will help to hide from natural conditions or predators GROW Your garden and grown plants can be very useful on your trip! CRAFT Craft items, weapons and equipment! EAT Food and water are very important! PLOT Exploring every meter of the island, find clues and important items to complete the story mission! COOPERATIVE Invite some friends to your game and try to survive with them! Can you do all this? Perhaps the fate of the whole earth depends on you ...
Meta Description: Looking for information on 4islands? Check out the release date (Oct 20, 2019), developer insights from RGS, and a complete game summary.
